event_text: The apprentices of the Clan are taking special training to learn how to disguise their scents from enemies with kelp and seawater.
m_c grumbles incoherently as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/trudge/trudges} back to camp, soaked and with {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} tail knotted and wrapped with seaweed. Poor m_c.
m_c received a present, dried but vibrant acc_plural, from r_c and decided to keep it with {PRONOUN/m_c/object} on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} tail.
m_c peeks out of their den, and finds that some seaweed managed to get into camp. m_c decides to use it as some cool decoration for {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} tail!
r_c, during a free sunny morning before dawn patrol, quietly wraps vibrant seaweed around m_c's tail.
m_c plucks a few marigolds from a nearby flower patch. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/wears/wear} it with poise.
r_c, inbetween grooming m_c, tucks marigolds next to m_c's ear. m_c almost doesn't notice the next morning, and purrs a thank you to r_c when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/walk/walks} by.
m_c catches a cool snail that slid into camp! {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/decide/decides} to keep the snail.
r_c and m_c find a cute snail with a red, pointy shell while hanging out in camp together! m_c decides to keep it with {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

m_c's eyes sparkle as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/realizes/realize} something wonderful --- {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} can propagate the reeds on c_n territory, and decorate {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} nest with it! A week later, m_c is seen sleeping soundly with thick stalks of dark green reeds casting shadows on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.

r_c has a wonderful idea for decorating m_c's nest! m_c wakes up in the middle of the night with reeds brushing {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} face. Despite the slight scare it gave m_c, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/thanks/thank} r_c in the morning for the nice surprise.

r_c, inbetween grooming m_c, tucks the prettiest frangipanis they could find next to m_c's ear. m_c almost doesn't notice the next morning, and purrs a thank you to r_c when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/walk/walks} by.
m_c plucks a few pristine white flowers from the camp's nearby frangipani bush. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/wears/wear} it with geniune joy, brighter than the beachy sun.
m_c gently guides a rabbit into camp. Seems like m_c has found a new friend?

m_c stares at a crab that wandered near the warrior's den. The crab stares back ominously. m_c squints at it, and the crab (somehow) squints back. Out of pure respect, m_c keeps the crab around {PRONOUN/m_c/object} when possible.

r_c decides to stop by the warrior's den, asking if m_c would like a crab. m_c nods with slight surprise, and r_c plops down the critter as it still attempts to crawl while on it's back. m_c doesn't crack {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} jaws into it's shell like expected. Instead, m_c flips it over and ogles it curiously. Seems like m_c has found a new friend...?
m_c curiously pokes and prods at a crab that wandered into camp. The crab, unbothered to m_c's antics, seems relaxed enough to keep as a pet. m_c cheerfully shows off {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} new friend!

r_c decides to stop by m_c while {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} are sunbathing in camp, asking if m_c would like a crab they caught. m_c nods, interested, and r_c plops down the critter as it still attempts to crawl while on it's back. m_c doesn't crack {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} jaws into it's shell like expected. Instead, m_c flips it over and ogles it curiously. Seems like m_c has found a new friend...?

r_c decides to stop by the nursery, asking if m_c would like to try a crab. m_c nods with big eyes, and r_c plops down the critter as it still attempts to crawl while on it's back. m_c doesn't crack {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} jaws into it's shell like expected. Instead, m_c flips it over and ogles it curiously. Seems like m_c has found a new friend...?

As a storm rages across the beach and waves crash upon the shore, m_c is tucked up in the medicine cat den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.
The things {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw today: omen_list_sight... m_c dips a paw in a rockpool, watching the tiny, crawling life inside, and considering what the omens foretell.
m_c sits by the water, contemplating the calm waves that brush {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} paws and wondering why times are not as peaceful as the tides.
A huge wave crashes into camp, leaving everyone soaked and the herb stores irreparably damaged.
